data.message: Why are we no longer able to UNFOLLOW a post ? Now we have to UNFOLLOW the friend . There are posts that i don't want on my F B , but i still want to have the friend . Now we either have to lose a friend or put some unclean things on our F B .??????????????????????????????????

replies.message: Hi John. If you'd like to see less stories from someone in your News Feed, just follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2mBHSAr. You can also unfollow someone if you don't want to see their posts in your News Feed. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2mBBFEq. -Jon

কে আমি JD Rohan Shagor Bhuiyan MD Amanullah Afrad Rasel Mia সূর্যের জীবনে কেউ আসবে Rj Raj Ridoy Imran Hossan Safik Md Erani Sohrab Sohan Dh Dhrampal Varma জাহিদুল ইসলাম সুমন Angel Sonali Rj Sabbir Khan Imran Khan
